Posts.Content: I had calcifications....had 2 mamograms, ultra sound and a biopsy...results were begnine but doctor wanted to remove it where they removed the cluster..well had surgery, lumpectomy...everything was benine without a hint of cancer....A-OK......its better to just get it over with and get peace of mine...Thank You God
Posts.Title: My Mother has Microcalcification 10yrs ago had same thing but with tumor NEED HELP
